name: Shell Protocol
introduce: Shell Protocol is a new ecosystem of DeFi primitives offering deep liquidity and fungible LP tokens to users. Shell v2 is built on two innovations: Proteus, an AMM engine, and the Ocean, a shared multi-token ledger. Proteus is a tool that can precisely implement any trading strategy, allowing concentrated liquidity with fungible LP tokens, as well as bonding curves that can evolve over time.
